articles.title: Top BBC bosses resign after criticism of the broadcaster’s editing of a Trump speech
articles.description:
Britain’s publicly funded national broadcaster has been criticized for editing a speech Trump made on Jan. 6, 2021, before protesters attacked the Capitol in Washington.

The post Top BBC bosses resign after criticism of the broadcaster’s editing of a Trump speech appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Top BBC executives resigned following backlash over editing Trump's January 6 speech.
The editing decision sparked widespread criticism, affecting BBC's credibility among viewers.
Boston residents may see increased discussions on media integrity and accountability.
